General.Name: Hunan Tyen Machinery Co Ltd A
General.Description: Hunan Tyen Machinery Co.,Ltd engages in the development, design, production, and sales of engine parts in China. The company offers turbochargers, which include diesel engine turbochargers, gasoline engine turbochargers, variable geometry turbochargers, two-stage turbochargers, and electric compressors; engine intake and exhaust valves; and cooling fans. It also provides after sales services. The company's products are used in construction machinery, vehicle machinery, agricultural machinery, marine machinery, high-speed rail trains, and other fields. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Hengyang, China.
General.Address: No. 195, Hejiang Tao Road, Hengyang, China, 421005
